txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Very sharp claws from the lizard-like creatures north of Oatbarton. You can make the delivery to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton centre.
'These are very strange to see. Thank you.'
'I have not seen them, but folks from Dwaling talk of scaled creatures near the waters and beaches nearby. Maybe you could get their claws...I am sure they are a unique curiosity.'
Mathom Society Task: Very Sharp Claws
The townsfolk in Oatbarton await the delivery of very sharp claws to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town.
Deliver the very sharp claws to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton

You have been tasked with collecting and delivering very sharp claws from the lizard-like creatures north of Oatbarton. You are to deliver the items to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town of Oatbarton.
Wanted: Very sharp claws from the lizard-like creatures north of Oatbarton.
